post.body: U could come visit me and my family if you like, I don't think we will be eating Chinese food on Christmas...:-)
I will work on it :-) How have you been?
Do U miss your cats? Want will u see them?
One of pic looks like butternut was trying to get some coffee :-) Where will U be for Chrismas?
Humm.. another post about me!? I am think :-)
Yes, I did :-)
Hiya!
So here I m "YOU ROCK!" I learned a lot from and I love http://tinyurl.com/5r2g8p
Amen to that! How R U? When I saw you at #ISMM I wanted to tell you, "YOU ROCK!" but someone was always talking to u :-)
http://twitpic.com/rxz3 - That ROCKS!
Hey, I love your new profile pic. Now I see you :-)
So would you be an expert on video games?
You can post your updated on ping.fm and it will post in FB, twitter and many more...
Cool! I will think of something to out in your basket :-)
What are you good at sport? Movies..etc
It is almost Friday :-)
I hope the wizard will be nice to you :-)
Do you have a blog? Anything that would let people know you better? http://twitter.com/jackthewhack
Hello Warren Good to see you :-)
Yep! You said it :-) How are you?
I read a lot of blogs, wrote my blog. spend time with my family. Did some work... A Good Day :-)
Well I am in CA USA, for me it is now 8:45 PM. I had a great day :-) Where R U?
Hi :-D Thank You for that! I am always happy whenever people understand my Chinglish.
Perfectionist can be a monster.
Thanks! You Rock!
Thanks! How are you?
Sorry I missed your tweets. My boy is under the weather, so he is a little more needy. I love your motto :-D
I learned that no matter what you do, you have to be yourself!
That is good one :-)
I like that, well said.
What is your plans for the holidays?
Stay warm and dry. Keep taking the emergenc they work :-) I am doing great, writing and reading blog post right now! Get well soon
Awesome, I will go read it in a little :-)
Hey Friend :-) I am feeling great! My boy is getting his 5th tooth. Christmas is coming... How are you?
I love the #4 and # 6 Video. It Rocks!
Thanks :-) Happy Holiday to you too :-)
It was like that for me yesterday.
@Akelaa How R the doggies?
((Hug)) Right back at you :-)
Hi, sorry I didn't get what you wrote earlier. I ran out the door.
Did you have a good day?
Wow Stay Inside! I went to a friends house to bake cookie. I did sugar cookie w/ the cookie cutter, U can't make out what the are.
That is a good movie.
How was your day?
Hey how are you?
O yes, Dylan is loving it. He thinks it is a party :-)
So true...I think they change! And get better with age.
Can U believe this year is almost coming to an end?
I know U can bring to the fun with you where ever u go, even at work :-) I am having a great day. Just working away.
Hiya! How are you today? What u up to?
that is good! @lizstrauss can collect her Dentist points too... I would like may be 5 visit and you get one free. A better deal!?
No Holiday seasons is complete without them :-) Have fun!
I have 2 sets of families... A new and a org :-)
I hope U get a chance to visit.
I am doing well, my son were sick so I was a little worry the last 2 days. But today he is doing much better. All is well!
Santa Barbara is beautiful and UCLA is a awesome school. Yeah, I can see why they luv it. Do U come to S.CAL to visit much?
I was in san francisco for 5 days, then to South CA. and I have been here ever since.
FEI world cup in Vegas is BIG for us :-) But if u r not into horse, it may be like watching paint dry LOL
It is in chicago. @Lizstrauss http://www.successful-blog.com/ She is awesome!
Hey girl friend! How are you?
That is cool, I have a 11 months old son. If you want to know, How I became Giovanna? http://tinyurl.com/6z4m9g
I am into horses 'Dressage' And in April is the FEI World cup at Las Vegas.
I planned on going to @lizstrauss Sobcon09 in May. R u going to be there?
Thx! My name is Italian, but I am not. Giulietta that is a beautiful name :-) How old is she?
Cool, I may go to vegas in April and we can visit :-)
Yeah, I just want to pick him up :-))@Akelaa You asked... :-) I am glad I made your night. #happy09
That sound interesting :-)
First started cause I notice you profile pic. (I love dog) and you are cute :-) I stay cause I chated w/ u and U R authentic.
Yeah, it was a little scary at the Dr. cause with baby things go bad fast! But we are good now! I learned a lot from this :-)
How about you?
If anyone wants to know more about 360 and PS3 video games follow @jackthewhack.
To understand is to except…you don’t understand. http://ping.fm/sHZSc
Do not let circumstances control you. You change your circumstances. - Jackie Chan
Time to go, I will back.

Peace on earth will come to stay, When we live Christmas every day. - Helen Steiner Rice

Ok, It is my bed time now! Good night San Diego, Chargers Wins!! Good night tweet peeps :-)
